card.name: Shapeshifter's Marrow
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a creature card, the player puts the card into his or her graveyard and Shapeshifter's Marrow becomes a copy of that card. (If it does, it loses this ability.)

card.name: Stormblood Berserker
card.text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Stormblood Berserker can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Ashling's Prerogative
card.text: As Ashling's Prerogative enters the battlefield, choose odd or even. (Zero is even.) Each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value has haste. Each creature without converted mana cost of the chosen value enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Hollowhenge Scavenger
card.text: Morbid - When Hollowhenge Scavenger enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Scarland Thrinax
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Scarland Thrinax.

card.name: Drudge Reavers
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) {B}: Regenerate Drudge Reavers.

card.name: Trinket Mage
card.text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Paragon of the Amesha
card.text: First strike {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Paragon of the Amesha becomes an Angel, gets +3/+3, and gains flying and lifelink.

card.name: Malachite Golem
card.text: {1}{G}: Malachite Golem gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Archers
card.text: Protection from artifacts; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Ghost-Lit Raider
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 2 damage to target creature. Channel - {3}{R}, Discard Ghost-Lit Raider: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Bladetusk Boar
card.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Lux Cannon
card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Lux Cannon. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Lux Cannon: Destroy target permanent.
